title: [Large-Scale] Optimization Strategies for RIS-Based Wireless Communication Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Wireless Communication Concepts and Fundamental Understanding of Signal Processing
context.additional_context: A practical optimization skills program for corporate communication infrastructure managers/leaders, designed for mobile learning in PC-free environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of RIS (Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface) technology, including reconfigurable surfaces and phase-change control.
Learners can systematically present step-by-step procedures for solving beamforming optimization problems in multi-user MIMO environments.
Learners can apply strategies to maximize minimum transmission rates under re-radiation mask constraints to real-world cases.

resources: Step-by-Step Video Tutorial (5 Minutes or Less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
